message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split in my favor since I'm affected by inflation while you're not. This way we both benefit.

I understand your concern about inflation, but since we're dividing $100 total, a 50-50 split seems most fair to start. If you accept now, you get $50 with only 5% inflation from one round. If we keep going back and forth, inflation will reduce your value more with each round.
